title: The Vampire Hunter's Daughter: Part VI
description: The sixth installment of The Vampire Hunter’s Daughter begins right where the fifth part left off, with Chloe and her friends running for their lives as they escape the dungeons below Trevor’s home. Chloe lights their way through the darkness, but they emerge into a bloody battle with her vampire nemesis and his minions. Even though Chloe has a battle on her hands, she is still a teenager and thinking about teenager things, like which of the handsome hunter boys she will choose. This installment will leave you wanting more as Chloe and the other vampire hunter’s take their final stand with Trevor. Who will walk away alive, who will die, and where will they go from there?Show More Show Less
author: Jennifer Malone Wright
